video_caption: The video begins with a man standing on a stage, addressing an audience in a large auditorium. He is dressed in a black shirt and jeans, holding a microphone, and gesturing with his hands as he speaks. Behind him, two large screens display a question in English: "What is the most important problem to solve in your field?" The audience is seated in rows, attentively watching the speaker. The stage is illuminated with warm lighting, and the background features a metal scaffolding structure. The scene transitions to a close-up of the speaker, emphasizing his expressions and gestures. The video then shifts to a wide shot of the auditorium, showing the audience from a distance, with the speaker still visible on stage. The screens behind him now display a different image, possibly related to the topic of learning and change. The video concludes with a serene landscape featuring wind turbines, accompanied by the text "It all starts with learning" and "Changing how people learn will always change the world," suggesting a focus on the importance of education and innovation.
